creator: killman@verizon.net
text:
Hi, I just got apache server and had high hopes it would give me the ability 
for me to host my web site for a while, now that I got php installed and 
running, i run the server, I can connect to my web site but whenever clients 
try to connect to it it just doesnt work and says Page Cannot Be Found. Why 
does this happen? Is apache only a local server? How do I mkae it wokr so 
remote clients can acess my web site?

creator: mads@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not for user problems, it is for bugreports only.
Please use the appropriate mailing list instead - see
http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users

Thanks for using Apache.
